Access a global customer base

We support fintech and digital business services by offering our bank relationship expertise and a global distribution channel.

Get started now

Matching your ambitions

Avoid lengthy legal negotiations with each bank by becoming a pre-vetted solution in our white label marketplace and be instantly accessible in our partnership ecosystem.

We are committed to being the most efficient facilitator of bringing great solutions to the market. As partners, we will share the risks of being at the forefront of innovation.
Our activities span a network of:

500 major banks,

thousands of SMEs and merchants and e-commerce merchants,

thousands of private and public sector companies, and a broad reach into the everyday life of consumers globally.

Focusing on strategy

We partner with great fintechs that offer best-in-class solutions to banking business customers

Be recognised as a pre-vetted, globally ready fintech service that can support a bank’s business customers

Increase scale by being available on our white-labeled marketplace for use by a network of banks, merchants, corporates, and public sector companies;

Leverage our industry expertise, networks, skills and local knowledge to build and optimise your solutions and jointly bring new offerings to the global marketplace;

Access our expertise on fintech product development, operations, and go to market strategies to qualify and sharpen your products and services.

For FinTechs
